Properties

statushttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#statuscodeStatus of the concept
deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0524 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
S Sequence conditionsSequence conditions
C Repeating cycle of ordersRepeating cycle of orders
R Reserved for possible future useReserved for possible future use

name: SequenceCondition
title: sequenceCondition
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts that identify whether sequence conditions or a repeating cycle of orders is defined.   This is part of the Order Sequence Definition used in HL7 Version 2.x messaaging in the OSD datatype.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0524 (Sequence condition)

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
